name: From A to Z
description:
You've got deliveries to make but the computer is broken! Use the physical cards to find the address and make your deliveries on time.

Rules
Make all the deliveries to the correct addresses in the time limit to win. The computer will display symbols which need to be decoded with the accompanying physical (real-life) cards. Use these to find the address intended for each package.

Note: for the best experience, print and cut out the cards, then play together with some buddies!

Controls
Arrow keys to move
Space to make a delivery

This game prototype was made by Eric, Andrew, George and Shawn for the Berlin Mini Game Jam (April 2019).
